scripts.copy: npm run copy:src && npm run copy:version
scripts.start:dev: npm run copy && concurrently "npm run watch:copy" "npm run serve:dist"
scripts.release: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run update:version && git add package.json version.json && git commit -m "release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push
